subjectslist.title: Subjects
subjectslist.content: Currently, we only deliver two subjects -- Android Developement and ReactJS Tutorial.

subjectitem.reactbody: React is a Javascript library for building user interfaces. It is developed by Facebook and widely used in Facebook's products. Now, it becomes one of the most popular front-end development tools with excellent propties -- Declarative, Component-Based and Practicality. You can write colorful web sites and powerful mobile apps once learnt React.
